reviews.review_msg: Awful for graduate studies. Just awful. Far too hard of a marker, and extremely vague about his expectations. Interesting prof, but to be avoided in Grad Studies.

There aren't many courses I can take and say 'yeah, I really learned something here', or many teachers who I feel empowered by.  But this course was absolutely one of them, and Gerald's that rare kind of prof.  Gerald respectfully asks his students to step back and have a good, hard look at their ideas.  Anyone at Lakehead should take his course!
Great Prof...A recent grad he really understands his students needs.  Oh yeah, his exams are open book.
Best Prof I have ever had...makes class super interesting and is super understanding and helpful...would take a class with him again any day and think everyone should take one with him
